CurveData class¶

A class that describes a curve.

_Curve__GetPreviousPointIndex(…) Given a current point index and a minimum euclidean distance, find the previous point that satisfies the minimum distance condition.

Visualize(vectors)[source]¶

## Temporary Implementation, will be moved to Visualization based Open3D.

Drawing the desired vector. Possible values: ‘T’ : Tangents ‘N’ : Normals ‘B’ : Bitangents

Developer Notes

To draw all three vectors at once for each point, should use something like this: draw_geometries([point_cloud, line_set])

Parameters: vectors – Either ‘T’, ‘N’ or ‘B’/
Returns: None
